18: אָבִ֞יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>[As for] his father</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> עָ֣שַׁק <sup>6231 </sup> <n>oppressed</n> עֹ֗שֶׁק <sup>6233 </sup> <n>because he cruelly</n> גָּזַל֙ <sup>1497 </sup> <n>spoiled</n> גֵּ֣זֶל <sup>1499 </sup> <n>by violence</n> אָ֔ח <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brother</n> וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>was not</n> ט֛וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[that] which [is] not good</n> עָשָׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and did</n> בְּת֣וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>among</n> עַמָּ֑יו <sup>5971 </sup> <n>his people</n> וְהִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> מֵ֖ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>lo even he shall die</n> בַּעֲוֹנֽוֹ׃ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>in his iniquity</n>
19: וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <sup>559 </sup> <n>Yet say</n> מַדֻּ֛עַ <sup>4069 </sup> <n>Why</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> נָשָׂ֥א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>bear</n> הַבֵּ֖ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>ye Why? doth not the son</n> בַּעֲוֹ֣ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>the iniquity</n> הָאָ֑ב <sup>1 </sup> <n>the father's</n> וְהַבֵּ֞ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> מִשְׁפָּ֧ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>that which is lawful</n> וּצְדָקָ֣ה <sup>6666 </sup> <n>and right</n> עָשָׂ֗ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>hath done</n> אֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> חֻקּוֹתַ֥י <sup>2708 </sup> <n>all my statutes</n> שָׁמַ֛ר <sup>8104 </sup> <n>[and] hath kept</n> וַיַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and hath done</n> אֹתָ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> חָיֹ֥ה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>them he shall surely</n> יִחְיֶֽה׃ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>live</n>
20: הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>The soul</n> הַחֹטֵ֖את <sup>2398 </sup> <n>that sinneth</n> הִ֣יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> תָמ֑וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>it shall die</n> בֵּ֞ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>The son</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יִשָּׂ֣א ׀ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>shall not bear</n> בַּעֲוֹ֣ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>the iniquity</n> הָאָ֗ב <sup>1 </sup> <n>of the father</n> וְאָב֙ <sup>1 </sup> <n>neither shall the father</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> יִשָּׂא֙ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>bear</n> בַּעֲוֹ֣ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>the iniquity</n> הַבֵּ֔ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the son</n> צִדְקַ֤ת <sup>6666 </sup> <n>the righteousness</n> הַצַּדִּיק֙ <sup>6662 </sup> <n>of the righteous</n> עָלָ֣יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> וְרִשְׁעַ֥ת <sup>7564 </sup> <n>shall be upon him and the wickedness</n> [רָשָׁע כ] (הָרָשָׁ֖ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>wicked</n> ק) עָלָ֥יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> תִּֽהְיֶֽה׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> ס
21: וְהָרָשָׁ֗ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>But if the wicked</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>if</n> יָשׁוּב֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>will turn</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> [חַטָּאתֹו כ] (חַטֹּאתָיו֙ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>sin</n> ק) אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשָׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that he hath committed</n> וְשָׁמַר֙ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>and keep</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> חֻקּוֹתַ֔י <sup>2708 </sup> <n>all my statutes</n> וְעָשָׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and do</n> מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>that which is lawful</n> וּצְדָקָ֑ה <sup>6666 </sup> <n>and right</n> חָיֹ֥ה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>he shall surely</n> יִחְיֶ֖ה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>live</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> יָמֽוּת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>he shall not die</n>
22: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> פְּשָׁעָיו֙ <sup>6588 </sup> <n>All his transgressions</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשָׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that he hath committed</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִזָּכְר֖וּ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>they shall not be mentioned</n> ל֑וֹ בְּצִדְקָת֥וֹ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>unto him in his righteousness</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשָׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that he hath done</n> יִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>he shall live</n>
23: הֶחָפֹ֤ץ <sup>2654 </sup> <n>Have I any pleasure</n> אֶחְפֹּץ֙ <sup>2654 </sup> <n>at all</n> מ֣וֹת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>the death</n> רָשָׁ֔ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>that the wicked</n> נְאֻ֖ם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>declares</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֑ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> הֲל֛וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>rather</n> בְּשׁוּב֥וֹ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>[and] not that he should return</n> מִדְּרָכָ֖יו <sup>1870 </sup> <n>from his ways</n> וְחָיָֽה׃ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>and live</n> ס
24: וּבְשׁ֨וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>turneth away</n> צַדִּ֤יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>But when the righteous</n> מִצִּדְקָתוֹ֙ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>from his righteousness</n> וְעָ֣שָׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and committeth</n> עָ֔וֶל <sup>5766 </sup> <n>iniquity</n> כְּכֹ֨ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> הַתּוֹעֵב֜וֹת <sup>8441 </sup> <n>according to all the abominations</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשָׂ֧ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[and] doeth</n> הָרָשָׁ֛ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>that the wicked</n> יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[man] doeth</n> וָחָ֑י <sup>2425 </sup> <n>shall he live</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>to all</n> [צִדְקָתֹו כ] (צִדְקֹתָ֤יו <sup>6666 </sup> <n>his righteousness</n> ק) אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשָׂה֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that he hath done</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִזָּכַ֔רְנָה <sup>2142 </sup> <n>shall not be mentioned</n> בְּמַעֲל֧וֹ <sup>4603 </sup> <n>in his trespass</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> מָעַ֛ל <sup>4604 </sup> <n>that he hath trespassed</n> וּבְחַטָּאת֥וֹ <sup>2403 </sup> <n>and in his sin</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> חָטָ֖א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>that he hath sinned</n> בָּ֥ם יָמֽוּת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>in them shall he die</n>
25: וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <sup>559 </sup> <n>Yet ye say</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> יִתָּכֵ֖ן <sup>8505 </sup> <n>is not equal</n> דֶּ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>The way</n> אֲדֹנָ֑י <sup>136 </sup> <n>of the Lord</n> שִׁמְעוּ־ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hear</n> נָא֙ <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>now O house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> הֲדַרְכִּי֙ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>Is not my way</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִתָּכֵ֔ן <sup>8505 </sup> <n>equal</n> הֲלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> דַרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>? are not your ways</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִתָּכֵֽנוּ׃ <sup>8505 </sup> <n>unequal</n>
26: בְּשׁוּב־ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>[man] turneth away</n> צַדִּ֧יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>When a righteous</n> מִצִּדְקָת֛וֹ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>from his righteousness</n> וְעָ֥שָׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and committeth</n> עָ֖וֶל <sup>5766 </sup> <n>iniquity</n> וּמֵ֣ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and dieth</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>because</n> בְּעַוְל֥וֹ <sup>5766 </sup> <n>in them for his iniquity</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשָׂ֖ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that he hath done</n> יָמֽוּת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall he die</n> ס
27: וּבְשׁ֣וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>[man] turneth away</n> רָשָׁ֗ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>Again when the wicked</n> מֵֽרִשְׁעָתוֹ֙ <sup>7564 </sup> <n>from his wickedness</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשָׂ֔ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that he hath committed</n> וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and doeth</n> מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>that which is lawful</n> וּצְדָקָ֑ה <sup>6666 </sup> <n>and right</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַפְשׁ֥וֹ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>his soul</n> יְחַיֶּֽה׃ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>alive</n>
28: וַיִּרְאֶ֣ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Because he considereth</n> [וַיָּשֹׁוב כ] (וַיָּ֔שָׁב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>break</n> ק) מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> פְּשָׁעָ֖יו <sup>6588 </sup> <n>from all his transgressions</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָשָׂ֑ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that he hath committed</n> חָי֥וֹ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>he shall surely</n> יִחְיֶ֖ה <sup>2421 </sup> <n>live</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> יָמֽוּת׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>he shall not die</n>
29: וְאָֽמְרוּ֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Yet saith</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִתָּכֵ֖ן <sup>8505 </sup> <n>is not equal</n> דֶּ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>The way</n> אֲדֹנָ֑י <sup>136 </sup> <n>of the Lord</n> הַדְּרָכַ֞י <sup>1870 </sup> <n>are not my ways</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִתָּֽכְנּוּ֙ <sup>8505 </sup> <n>equal</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>O house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> הֲלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> דַרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>? are not your ways</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִתָּכֵֽן׃ <sup>8505 </sup> <n>unequal</n>
30: לָכֵן֩ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Therefore</n> אִ֨ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> כִּדְרָכָ֜יו <sup>1870 </sup> <n>according to his ways</n> אֶשְׁפֹּ֤ט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>Therefore I will judge</n> אֶתְכֶם֙ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>you O house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> נְאֻ֖ם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>GOD</n> שׁ֤וּבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Repent</n> וְהָשִׁ֙יבוּ֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and turn</n> מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> פִּשְׁעֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>6588 </sup> <n>[yourselves] from all your transgressions</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>may not</n> יִהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לָכֶ֛ם לְמִכְשׁ֖וֹל <sup>4383 </sup> <n>shall not be your ruin</n> עָוֹֽן׃ <sup>5771 </sup> <n>so iniquity</n>
31: הַשְׁלִ֣יכוּ <sup>7993 </sup> <n>Cast away</n> מֵעֲלֵיכֶ֗ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> פִּשְׁעֵיכֶם֙ <sup>6588 </sup> <n>from you all your transgressions</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> פְּשַׁעְתֶּ֣ם <sup>6586 </sup> <n>whereby ye have transgressed</n> בָּ֔ם וַעֲשׂ֥וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and make</n> לָכֶ֛ם לֵ֥ב <sup>3820 </sup> <n>heart</n> חָדָ֖שׁ <sup>2319 </sup> <n>you a new</n> וְר֣וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>spirit</n> חֲדָשָׁ֑ה <sup>2319 </sup> <n>and a new</n> וְלָ֥מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>why</n> תָמֻ֖תוּ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>for why will ye die</n> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>O house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n>
32: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> אֶחְפֹּץ֙ <sup>2654 </sup> <n>For I have no pleasure</n> בְּמ֣וֹת <sup>4194 </sup> <n>in the death</n> הַמֵּ֔ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>of him that dieth</n> נְאֻ֖ם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֑ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> וְהָשִׁ֖יבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>wherefore turn</n> וִֽחְיֽוּ׃ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>[yourselves] and live</n> פ
